name: MetricWire
headline: Mobile surveys for researchers
description:
MetricWire’s mobile platform allows decision makers, researchers, and stakeholders to harness unparalleled insights solutions, analytical tools, and deeper audience connections.  Our innovation has lead to real-time digital interventions, enriched research, and evidence-based decisions.

Capture more powerful data and make better decisions

## HOW WE HELP
## Metricwire helps organizations measure real-world experiences to inform innovative treatments, service offerings and policies that impact the outcomes that people value.
## Rich In Data, Poor In Insight
Understanding the real-world problems faced by your audience requires insight into everyday life, but the data either doesn’t exist or is difficult to interpret.
Metricwire enables relevant and contextualized data collection, helping you discover powerful insights that others have missed in a shorter amount of time.
### Remove The Noise
## Causation Vs. Correlation
Understanding the genesis of signs, symptoms, and conditions, is paramount to creating impactful and lasting treatment policies.
Metricwire’s intelligent protocols adapt to individual behavior and context, helping you stay on the critical path to understanding what strategies work and for whom.
### Follow The Evidence
## Lack Of Effective Interventions
Inability to effectively monitor, assess and connect with participants during a trial leaves participants isolated, disengaged and potentially at risk.
Metricwire keeps your participants and your protocol connected through real-time access to actionable information and the world’s best digital intervention tools.
### Impact Beyond The Lab
## INNOVATION WITH IMPACT
## Metricwire’s technology allows your research to adapt to individual behaviour and real-world context to identify the mechanisms for change – faster.
## Novel Data
  * Rich ESM/EMA features to support qualitative insights at quantitative scale.
  * Capture objective sensor data to understand the environmental aspects contributing to participant responses.
  * Run cognitive experiments and evaluate digital interventions under real world conditions.

generated_description:
MetricWire is an innovative company based in Kitchener, Canada, that specializes in mobile surveys designed specifically for researchers and decision-makers. Founded as part of Y Combinator's S14 batch, MetricWire emerged with a clear mission: to facilitate real-time insights through advanced analytical tools, enabling stakeholders to forge deeper connections with their audiences.

At its core, MetricWire recognizes that traditional data collection methods often fall short in capturing the nuances of real-world experiences. By leveraging mobile technology, the platform allows organizations to gather rich, contextualized data that informs evidence-based decisions. The company's unique approach not only enhances the quality of data but also adapts in real-time to individual behaviors and contexts—a crucial factor in understanding complex phenomena.

The services offered by MetricWire include mobile diaries, in-the-moment observations, and comprehensive reporting tools that support a wide range of qualitative insights. Their passive sensors and geo-location capabilities facilitate a powerful blend of subjective and objective data, empowering researchers to uncover actionable insights that others might miss.

MetricWire's platform is designed to maintain participant engagement throughout research projects, ensuring that subjects remain connected and informed. This commitment to real-time digital intervention fosters an environment where participants can express their thoughts and feelings as events unfold, adding layers of richness to the data collected.

In a landscape often cluttered with "rich data, poor insights," MetricWire strives to strip away the noise, helping researchers discern correlations and causations to craft impactful policies and solutions that resonate with the real-world challenges faced by people today.

The company operates with a lean team of three and continues to evolve, emphasizing privacy and security in its data collection practices to build trust and confidence with users. If you’re interested in learning more, you can visit [MetricWire's website](http://metricwire.com).
